name: IT201 Project 2 (zeldafan36143)
description:
My app spawns spheres on the screen when the user uses the left mouse button on the scene. The user can interact with the scene with the left mouse button and the onscreen UI buttons to modify the spheres spawned. 

The new features are a slider that affects light intensity, a stopwatch that shows total time elapsed, a drop down menu for your favorite food, and a checkmark toggle box to invert gravity.
